content: a cute crocheted crop top with halter neck ties and back lace fastening this top has halter neck ties and a back lace-up closure therefore it is easily adjustable to fit a variety of different shapes and sizes it is made from the top down starting at the front neck edge increases are made at the beginning and end of each row to create the triangular shaped front panel i have based the pattern on two sizes although it is easily adjustable for smaller or larger sizes by reducing or increasing the number of row worked in each section there is a comprehensive youtube tutorial available for this pattern as well as a full written pattern
